message: Please help us.

replies.text: Did the thieves return and stole your cookbook again?

message: Please talk to Gison.
Finally, our hero has returned.
Thieves are no longer a problem to us, thanks to you.
The problem is far more dangerous and risky especially from a kid.

replies.text: You still not learning, old man.
I'm far more dangerous than them.

message: You see it's been a long time since our house has not been disturb by an earth shake but we suddenly experience it from time to time.

replies.text: Hmmm...a sudden earth shake. Sounds familiar to me when I was in Stoutford's Church.
Hmmm...a sudden earth shake. Sounds familiar to me when I was in Stoutford's Church.
Hmmm...a sudden earth shake. Sounds familiar to me when I was in Stoutford's Church.
But earth shake is, randomly and normally, occur.

message: Wow clap to you, kid. You are really attentive to your teacher.
This is a serious event that I want you to find out.

replies.text: A mystery case to solve, I'm in!
But that's just a normal event that happens to us occasionally! I'm out of here.

message: I sense mysterious force beneath my house.
Please help us if you are really not just a kid.

replies.text: I'll prove it to you once more.

message: Good. Listen carefully.
I want you to talk to Gael. Persuade him to give you a permission to go down the basement.
He is living in a small cottage near to this house. Don't forget-
Don't forget to bring him meat - especially the exotic one.
The earth shake? It's a normal disaster. But meat...ahh-I cannot live a day without it.
If you are that curious, then I want you to check the basement. But-
You have to bring me something.
Not just any meat- meat from a different place.

replies.text: I better ask merchants for that.

message: Hello kid. Did you bring an exotic meat for me?

replies.text: I have a goat meat here from Stoutford
I'm still looking for a specific merchant.

message: Wow! That is an exotic meat. Thank you.

replies.text: Indeed. A meat from a distant foreign place.

message: (Burp!) Ahhh...fresh meat.
Thank you for the goat meat, kid.
Suit yourself. But I warn you.
There is no going back once you go down there. Unless-
You found another way to go back here.

replies.text: Wait what?! There is no ladder or rope to go down there?

message:
You found another way to go back here. 
 Here's the key.

replies.text: Wait what?! There is no ladder or rope to go down there?

message: It's not that deep to jump down there. I'll have to go out hunting. Good luck
The basement hatch is locked.

replies.text: What the? Is that a snake?! It's so big!

message: Sssshhhh! Fight or run, you will taste my venom for what you did to my only child!

replies.text: I have to kill you first.
Only child? Which means these are your cousins?!
Your child deserves it for it threatens the birth of my place. For Crossglen!
What the? Is this another thieves guild?
Finally, another worthless group of thieves.
Wow! I'm no longer in a wrong path.

message: Let's drink and be merry with golds!
Let's drink and be merry with evil plan!
Welcome, to the secret party beneath our target's house.
Hi, kid. I'm John. Want to play with my big bro?

replies.text: What are we going to play?

message: Stop talking to my li'l bro. I'm Jon, what are you doing here?

replies.text: I'm here to finish my job.
I'm here to offer you more than these.

message: Get out of here, kid.
Interesting. What is it?
Business gives us more money. But what kind of business?

replies.text: I can negotiate a special price with Gison, the soupmaker, to secretly supply your guild with soup. After that, your guild must leave this place.
A business to kill all of you.
Nevermind. I forgot about it again.

message: What an interesting negotiation.

Me and my li'l bro accept your offer. Bring 2 bottles of soup for me and my li'l bro. 
 Take as much gold as you want over there. Return here once you are done.
Here comes our delivery, big bro!
Where's our deal, partner?
Finally, I'll talk to my guild cook about soup business. Let's go home everyone!

replies.text: I'm glad my job woks peacefully.

message: Grrrr! Fight or run, you will taste our sharp blade for what you did to our brothers!

replies.text: I have to kill all of you first.
Your brothers? Which means these are your cousins?!
Your brothers deserves it for it threatens the origin of cookbook. For the cookbook!

message: You. Shall. Not. Pass!
What?! Talk to one of my thief boss over there.
Behind the underground thief warden's location is a rope tightly hanged upstraight and you saw a light from above

replies.text: Oh wait. I have to check if I already loot everything.

message: Hello kid.
Thank you for helping us again. We can no longer feel our house shaking.
Thank you for helping us again. We feel our house less shaking than before.
Ah ha, our hero has finally returned. Thank you for helping us once more!
Before I give you my reward. Please tell me what's beneath my very own lovely house?

replies.text: There was something hidden beneath your house.

message: [shock] I knew there was something going on beneath my house. What was it?

replies.text: A band of thieves secretly plotted evil against your cookbook again.

message: Not my cookbook again. What else?

replies.text: A gigantic worm dwelling beneath your house.
I see nothing else but only them.

message: Geez. Did you kill them all?

replies.text: Yes, I killed all of the thieves.
Not all of them. They accept my negotiation to leave instead of stealing your cookbook again.
Not all of them. They accept my negotiation to leave instead of stealing your cookbook again.

message: Ah. But why I can still feel the house less shaking? Go back down there and finish this to receive your reward.
You made me shock, kid. But why I can still feel the house less shaking? Go back down there and we will talk later about it.
You made me shock, kid. Whatever negotiation is that for them to accept it. I must know it as well.

replies.text: The special price for my negotiation is only your soup in exchange of peace.

message: Why didn't they say so? Ha ha ha. We'll give them an extra bottle of soup.
Give me 4 of Bogsten's mushrooms and 2 empty bottles and then I could sell them my soup for only 100 gold.

replies.text: I have to get more of Bogsten's mushrooms.
I just noticed that my gold fund is low.

message: Here you are. Hurry now.
Finally! I can feel it because I can no longer feel the house shaking.

replies.text: I'm glad to help, happy feet.

message: Hahaha. As usual, my reward is let me give you a free taste of our new trending limited mushroom milk soup.

replies.text: Thank you. Looks delicious and healthy.
Why is the soup color white?

message: We added milk to be healthier and more delicious.
Give me 2 of Bogsten's mushrooms, a milk and an empty bottle, then I could sell you a portion for only 53 gold.
I still have some of my delicious milk soup. How many bottles of milk soup do you want?

replies.text: I need milk soup! At least ten bottles! Quick!!
I don't have an empty bottle.
I have to get more of Bogsten's mushrooms.
I have to buy a bottle of milk
I just noticed that my gold fund is low.

message: You brought an empty bottle, a milk, Bogsten's mushrooms and the 53 gold. Here it is.
You don't have the items I need for that exchange. Bring me an empty bottle, a milk, two of Bogsten's mushrooms and 53 gold for each portion.

replies.text: I will be back with those.

message: You brought all ingredients needed for 5 portions. Here you go.

Whoah. You are hungry, aren't you?
Here you go.
Indeed. I'm cooking something new here - a mead soup as our another secret business in Thieves guild. Thank you for your help, kid.

replies.text: Glad to help our thieves guild.

message: Give me 2 of Bogsten's mushrooms, a mead and an empty bottle, then I could sell you a portion for only 51 gold.
I still have some of my delicious mead soup. How many bottles of soup do you want?

replies.text: I need mead soup! At least ten bottles! Quick!!
I don't have an empty bottle.
I have to get more of Bogsten's mushrooms.
I have to buy one bottle of mead.
I just noticed that my gold fund is low.

message: You brought an empty bottle, Bogsten's mushrooms, a mead and the 51 gold. Here it is.
You don't have the items I need for that exchange. Bring me an empty bottle, two of Bogsten's mushrooms, one mead and 51 gold for each portion.

replies.text: I will be back with those.

message: You brought all ingredients needed for 5 portions. Here you go.

Whoah. You are hungry, aren't you?
Here you go.
You find an empty bottle.
You find a bottle.
You find an empty bottle.
You find an empty bottle.
Finally an exit! Unfortunately, you are too short to reach the hanging rope and the broken rope was too short to use.
You find an empty bottle.
You find an empty bottle.
You find three empty bottles.
You find some gold to loot.
You find some gold to loot.
You find some gold to loot.
You find some gold to loot.
You find some gold to loot.
You find some gold to loot.
You find some gold to loot.
There are wood furnitures blocking your path.

replies.text: I better find another way in.

message: You find an empty bottle.

replies.text: Wow! Someone used to live down here?
